title: AN URGENT CALL TO THE NATION
content: Dr. Telli C Rajaratnam Sri Lanka still faces great challengesin this world, but we look forward to meeting them. We can successfullymaintain the territorial integrity of Sri Lanka. We must stand unitedas Patriots of Sri Lankato support and defend, President Mahinda Rajapaksa to develop the country.The devolution of Power to the North will be a…
